primary_personas.name: Rental Seeker (User)
primary_personas.role: Individual searching for a rental property in Seattle
goals: Find a suitable rental property quickly and efficiently.
Keep track of multiple properties, their details, and associated images.
Evaluate properties based on specific criteria, including commute times.
Avoid missing out on good properties due to disorganization.
pain_points: Overwhelmed by the number of listings and scattered information.
Difficulty comparing properties side-by-side with custom criteria.
Losing track of property details or images from various sources.
Inaccurate or outdated commute time information.

behavior_patterns.technology_comfort: High, willing to use custom tools.

success_metrics: Successfully finding and securing a rental property.
Reduced time spent on property tracking and organization.
Feeling confident in property evaluation decisions.

secondary_personas.name: Housemate/Partner
secondary_personas.role: Collaborator in the rental search process
secondary_personas.relationship_to_primary: Shares the goal of finding a rental, provides input and feedback.
key_concerns: Clarity and accessibility of property information.
Ability to easily review properties and provide feedback.
Understanding commute implications for their own needs.

user_journey_stages.awareness: Realizes need for a structured property tracking system.
user_journey_stages.consideration: Evaluates existing tools vs. building a custom solution.
user_journey_stages.decision: Decides to use the Rental Property Tracker.
user_journey_stages.onboarding: Sets up the application and understands basic data entry.
user_journey_stages.adoption: Regularly uses the application to track properties.
user_journey_stages.advocacy: Recommends the tool to others (if applicable, or simply finds it indispensable).
